h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Red Tides Location
content: This is an optional boss, and with him being accessible so early in the game, you may struggle. However, our Guangzhi boss guide will help you out.

This is an optional boss, and with him being accessible so early in the game, you may struggle. However, our Guangzhi boss guide will help you out.
